versions.name: Potential DNS Tunneling via Iodine v100.0.0
versions.description: Iodine is a tool for tunneling Internet protocol version 4 (IPV4) traffic over the DNS protocol to circumvent firewalls, network security groups, and network access lists while evading detection.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Normal use of Iodine is uncommon apart from security testing and research. Use by non-security engineers is very uncommon.
versions.query: event.category:process and event.type:(start or process_started) and process.name:(iodine or iodined)
